description: Hydrophilic interaction silica cartridges. For post-labeling purification of LudgerTag™ fluorophore and chromophore labeled glycans. Suitable for cleanup after glycan labeling with 2-AB (2-aminobenzamide) and 2-AA (2-aminobenzoic acid). Each pack contains 6 cartridges.Can be used in a vacuum manifold system (e.g. Ludger LV system) that can process up to 96 cartridges simultaneously.
name: LudgerClean T1 Cartridges
